item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 21, 2024 at 2:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Ultra high-resolution image of The Night Watch (194 points | 51 comments)
2. Kamal Proxy – A minimal HTTP proxy for zero-downtime deployments (78 points | 47 comments)
3. Visualizing Weather Forecasts Through Landscape Imagery (502 points | 52 comments)
4. Forget ChatGPT: why researchers now run small AIs on their laptops (35 points | 6 comments)
5. Show HN: Container Desktop – Podman Desktop Companion (386 points | 161 comments)
6. Critical Exploit in MediaTek Wi-Fi Chipsets: Zero-Click Vulnerability (182 points | 59 comments)
7. Vaporizing plastics recycles them into nothing but gas (30 points | 26 comments)
8. Nango (YC W23) is hiring fullstack engs to solve product integrations ( | hide)
9. The Collapse of Self-Worth in the Digital Age (77 points | 41 comments)
10. Show HN: Put this touch sensor on a robot and learn super precise tasks (319 points | 57 comments)
11. How do archivists package things? The battle of the boxes (104 points | 15 comments)
12. Cold war spy satellites and AI detect ancient underground aqueducts (48 points | 4 comments)
13. MemoRAG – Enhance RAG with memory-based knowledge discovery for long contexts (154 points | 27 comments)
14. Porsche's idea for a six-stroke internal combustion engine (90 points | 207 comments)
15. Antarctica's Ozone Hole Is Healing and Set to Recover by 2066 (14 points | discuss)
16. Mitosis in the Gray-Scott model: writing shader-based chemical simulations (93 points | 24 comments)
17. The Gravo-Thermal Catastrophe (11 points | discuss)
18. Linux/4004: booting Linux on Intel 4004 for fun, art, and no profit (497 points | 123 comments)
19. Reactive Relational Algebra (146 points | 30 comments)
20. Counting Sheeps with Contracts in Python (5 points | 2 comments)
21. Glass Antenna Turns Windows into 5G Base Stations (7 points | discuss)
22. Kubesafe: Never run Kubernetes commands on the wrong cluster again (44 points | 23 comments)
23. CuPy: NumPy and SciPy for GPU (332 points | 95 comments)
24. Remains of Egyptian army barracks and a bronze sword unearthed by archaeologists (6 points | discuss)
25. Tō Reo – A Māori Spellchecker (157 points | 30 comments)
26. Gaining access to anyones Arc browser without them even visiting a website (1271 points | 431 comments)
27. Show HN: Open-source text classification CLI – train models with no labeled data (65 points | 3 comments)
28. Show HN: CNC Microscopy for Fun (114 points | 20 comments)
29. Large Text Compression Benchmark (83 points | 46 comments)
30. Sshfs for Windows (59 points | 25 comments)
